name: IT Clicker: Dinosaur in the Code World
name_original: IT Clicker: Dinosaur in the Code World
description:
Welcome to the thrilling world of the IT industry! In our game, "IT Clicker: Dinosaur in the Code World," anyone can try their hand at being an IT whiz. We'll show you just how easy and fun it is to make money in the world of IT.

So, where do you start? Simply click on our adorable IT dinosaur to earn money! The more clicks you make, the more money you'll accumulate. But don't stop there! Purchase new items, from stylish keyboards and trendy headphones to space-age computers and quantum processors. Show everyone that you're the top IT professional in the industry!

Money, money, money! After all, in the IT world, it's all about the cash, right? That's why you can invest your hard-earned funds into upgrades and improvements to become even wealthier and more successful. And who knows, maybe you'll have a chance to find special items that grant you superpowers and fast-track your way to the top of the IT Olympus!

Don't forget to visit the Steam store to enjoy the fantastic graphics and delightful animations of our game. Perhaps it's here that you'll discover your true calling and become a true hero of the IT world!

Ready to test yourself as an IT professional and earn a fortune? Well then, click away and become a legend in IT Clicker: Dinosaur in the Code World!
